# calendar

**Instance Property**

The calendar to use when formatting the date.

## Declaration

```swift
var calendar: Calendar
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar/autoupdatingCurrent]. If you set this property to `nil`, the formatter resets to using `autoupdatingCurrent`.

## Modifying a Date Format Style

- **timeZone**: The time zone to use when formatting the date and time components.
- **capitalizationContext**: The capitalization context to use when formatting the date.
- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting the date and time components.
